quotes.quote: I never expect to see a perfect work from imperfect man.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quotes.quote: Perfection is a road, not a destination. Every time I live, I get an education.
quotes.author: Burk Hudson

quotes.quote: Aim for success, not perfection. Never give up your right to be wrong, because then you will lose the ability to learn new things and move forward with your life.
quotes.author: Dr. David M. Burns

quotes.quote: Assert your right to make a few mistakes. If people can't accept your imperfections, that's their fault.
quotes.author: Dr. David M. Burns

quotes.quote: Remember that fear always lurks behind perfectionism. Confronting your fears and allowing yourself the right to be human can, paradoxically, make you a far happier and more productive person.
quotes.author: Dr. David M. Burns

quotes.quote: Artists who seek perfection in everything are those who cannot attain it in anything.
quotes.author: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.quote: I do think imperfection's underrated.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: No one can be perfectly free till all are free; no one can be perfectly moral till all are moral; no one can be perfectly happy till all are happy.
quotes.author: John Eliot, Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Perfectionism is simply putting a limit on your future. When you have an idea of perfect in your mind, you open the door to constantly comparing what you have now with what you want. That type of self criticism is significantly deterring.
quotes.author: John Eliot, Ph.D.

quotes.quote: The idea of perfect closes your mind to new standards.. When you drive hard toward one ideal, you miss opportunities and paths, not to mention hurting your confidence. Believe in your potential and then go out and explore it; don�t limit it.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: I don't confuse greatness with perfection. To be great anyhow is�the higher achievement.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: I am careful not to confuse excellence with perfection. Excellence, I can reach for; perfection is God's business.
quotes.author: Michelle Burford

quotes.quote: [M]aybe the most any of us can expect of ourselves isn't perfection but progress.
quotes.author: Saint Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: To demand perfection is a sure way to be disappointed in everybody, for you will be bound to think ill of others.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Have patience with all things, but chiefly have patience with yourself. Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections but instantly set about remedying them - every day begin the task anew.
quotes.author: Samuel McChord Crothers

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it.
Try as hard as we may for perfection, the net result of our labors is an amazing variety of imperfectness. We are surprised at our own versatility in being able to fail in so many different ways.
If you'd like to be good at something, the first thing to out the window is the notion of perfection.
You have to let people see what you wrote. It will never be perfect, but perfect is overrated. Perfect is boring.
We are all imperfect. We cannot expect perfect government.
